code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import IMDPImg from"./images/imbp.png";import TomatoImg from"./images/image (1).webp";import LoveImg from"./images/Favorite.svg";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var MovieUnit=function MovieUnit(_ref){var movie=_ref.movie;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card p-2 text-start m-3",style:{width:"18rem"},"data-testid":"movie-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:"/movie/".concat(movie.id),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w300".concat(movie.poster_path),className:"card-img-top wow",alt:movie.title,"data-testid":"movie-poster"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:LoveImg,className:"fav",alt:"Favourite","data-testid":"movie-poster",style:{width:"6rem"}})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card-body",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"card-text","data-testid":"movie-release-date",children:[movie.origin_country," ",movie.release_date]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"card-title","data-testid":"movie-title",children:movie.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"d-flex my-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:IMDPImg,className:"",alt:"...",style:{width:"35px",height:"17px"}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{style:{margin:"-4px 13px 0px"},children:[movie.popularity," / 100"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:TomatoImg,className:"",alt:"...",style:{width:"16px",height:"17px"}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{style:{margin:"-4px 10px 0px"},children:[movie.popularity,"%"]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-dark",children:movie.tagline})]})]});};export default MovieUnit;
